full_name: Scenario III: Return to The Secret Name

steps.text: Set the seven “Unknown Places” locations aside as a separate “Unknown Places Deck.” To do this, perform the following:

bullets.text: Add the 4 new "Unknown Places" locations to the original 7.
Set the Witch House Ruins aside and randomly remove 4 Unknown Places locations from the game.

Shuffle the Unknown Places with Witch House Ruins on its revealed side and three other random Unknown Places locations together to form the bottom four cards of the Unknown Places Deck, unrevealed side faceup.

Then, place the other three Unknown Places locations on top, in a random order. All seven cards of the Unknown Places deck should be showing only the unrevealed side, so the players do not know which of the Unknown Places is the Witch House Ruins.
